EmailTemplate.name: End Date is approaching
EmailTemplate.subject: NOTIFICATION : {!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.Parent_Project__c} - End Date is approaching for {!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.OwnerFullName},
Planned End date for {!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.Name} for Project {!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.Parent_Project__c} is approaching and is due tomorrow.
Please click on the link below to access the item
{!DRDW_Proj_Activity__c.Link}
Your action is important as this will avoiding delaying overall project.
Thank you. Leadership Team
